name: Venice
fun_fact: Fun fact: Venice has NO cars, NO bicycles, and NO wheeled vehicles of any kind - everything moves by foot or boat, making it the world's largest pedestrian city. Food deliveries arrive by boat to restaurants perched on canals!

hero_dishes.name: Cicchetti
hero_dishes.description: Venetian tapas - small bites on bread or toothpicks eaten standing at bars (bÃ cari)
hero_dishes.origin_story: Venice's answer to tapas, eaten while bar-hopping between bÃ cari in the tradition called 'giro d'ombra' (going for a shadow of wine)
hero_dishes.where_to_find: All'Arco, Cantina Do Mori (since 1462!), Cantina Do Spade, Osteria Al Squero

hero_dishes.name: Sarde in Saor
hero_dishes.description: Sweet and sour sardines with onions, raisins, and pine nuts - eaten cold
hero_dishes.origin_story: Created by Venetian sailors who needed preserved fish for long voyages. The vinegar acted as a preservative while the sweet ingredients provided energy
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Every bÃ caro serves this classic, Osteria Ae Sconte, Osteria Ai Rusteghi

hero_dishes.name: Risi e Bisi
hero_dishes.description: Rice and pea soup, so thick it's eaten with a fork - Venice's official dish
hero_dishes.origin_story: Served to the Doge on April 25 (St. Mark's Day) using the first spring peas from the lagoon islands. It must be 'all'onda' (wavy, not too thick)

hero_dishes.name: Fegato alla Veneziana
hero_dishes.description: Thinly sliced calf's liver with onions, cooked until meltingly tender
hero_dishes.origin_story: A Venetian invention that spread worldwide - the onions must cook for hours until completely soft and sweet
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Trattoria alla Madonna, Osteria al Cicheto

signature_drinks.name: Spritz
signature_drinks.description: Aperol or Select bitter with prosecco and soda water
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: THE aperitivo drink - served everywhere at 6pm, bright orange and refreshing. Order 'Spritz con Select' for the authentic Venetian bitter

signature_drinks.name: Ombra
signature_drinks.description: Small glass of wine - the name means 'shadow'
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: Named because wine sellers would set up in St. Mark's shadow to keep wine cool. Quick sips while standing at bÃ cari
